section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE 32ND SESSION
sentences: The draft report of IPCC 32 (IPCC-XXXIII/Doc.8) was adopted on Tuesday morning with small amendments, including one clarifying that the SYR would be based exclusively on material contained in the three Working Group Reports and Special Reports produced during the 5th or previous Assessment Cycles.
enb_long_title: Thirty-third Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
